name: loadproperty
title: Load Property
description:
Loads a external property sheet to be used with in the current project. The properties imported from the property sheet are overwritten if any new property with same namesa are defined.
Useful while haveing multiple environments with multiple properties, or while running same target for different properties.
Note: The property sheet path must be either from the basedir attribute or qualified full path

examples.note: Please refer to the Tutorials section in the website or Reference folder in the source code.
